name: slugfest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a difficult game or competition, especially in sports such as boxing and baseball: The fight was a hard, horrible 12-round slugfest.
a situation in which people compete very hard with each other in order to be successful: The race in Oklahoma for the US Senate has escalated into a slugfest in recent weeks.
